definitions: transfer (control of an activity or organization) to several local offices or authorities rather than one single one

examples.text: we need to decentralize the government so that the people can begin to assume some responsibilities

shortDefinitions: transfer authority from central to local government

definitions: move departments of (a large organization) away from a single administrative center to other locations

examples.text: new technology allows companies to decentralize large factories
he argues that giant corporations must decentralize

shortDefinitions: move departments of large organization away from single administrative centre
